title: AI Literacy Professional Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using learners' personal devices (BYOD), with a focus on integrating AI technology in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze fundamental AI technology principles and educational application cases to design integration methods for language classes
Learners can create personalized language learning content and establish evaluation systems using generative AI tools
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers through project-based learning to develop AI-based educational scenarios and apply them to actual classroom settings

resources: Collection of AI tools for education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
